product_name: Jack BlackDeep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser
summary: SummaryJack Black's Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser washes away dead skin cells, pore-clogging oil, and buildup, leaving skin fresher, smoother, firmer.
details: DetailsBenefitsA multifunctional, clay-based cleanser.For deep down cleaning, this 2-in-1 cleanser can also be used as a purifying mask when left to dry on skin. Recommended for normal, combination, and oily skin.Dermatologist TestedCruelty FreeFormulated WithoutSulfatesParabensFragrancesAlcoholColorantsKey IngredientsGlycolic Acid: A highly effective chemical exfoliant removes dead skin cell buildup for noticeably softer, firmer, clearer skin. Also helps to prevent ingrown hairs.Volcanic Ash: Packed with revitalizing antioxidants, the natural particles work as a gentle physical exfoliant to help smooth, and resurface the skin.Kaolin Clay: A natural clay that draws out skin impurities, oil and dirt, plus helps control oiliness due to its natural absorption properties.Item 2272361How To UseTo use as a daily cleanser, apply a nickel-size amount to wet hands, work into a creamy lather and apply to slightly damp face using a circular motion. Immediately rinse. For deep down cleansing, switch this cleanser to a purifying mask. Apply a nickel-size amount to dry face and evenly apply using a circular motion, avoiding eye area and lips. Allow to dry approximately 5 minutes. Rinse.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid eye contact. If product enters eyes, rinse with water.IngredientsAqua (Water/Eau), Kaolin, Glycerin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Volcanic Ash, Avena Sativa (Oat/Avoine) Kernel Flour, Sodium Chloride, Acrylates Copolymer, Glycolic Acid, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary/Romarin) Leaf Extract*, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea/Thé vert) Leaf Extract*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract*, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract*, Tocopheryl Acetate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower/ Tournesol) Seed Oil*, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract*, Tocopherol, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/ Stem Extract, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Metabisulfite, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid.*Certified Organic/Certifiés BiologiquesAs part of Jack Black's commitment to always offer the highest quality products, some of the ingredients in their formulations may be updated from time to time. The ingredient list shown here may vary from product packaging, depending on the location and timing of purchase.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To use as a daily cleanser, apply a nickel-size amount to wet hands, work into a creamy lather and apply to slightly damp face using a circular motion. Immediately rinse. For deep down cleansing, switch this cleanser to a purifying mask. Apply a nickel-size amount to dry face and evenly apply using a circular motion, avoiding eye area and lips. Allow to dry approximately 5 minutes. Rinse.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid eye contact. If product enters eyes, rinse with water.
ingredients: Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea/Thé vert) Leaf Extract*

reviews.headline: Would definitely buy again
reviews.comments: Cleans great and don't dry skin out

reviews.headline: My husband's favorite
reviews.comments: This is my husband's favorite face wash. It works great at exfoliating under his beard and is gentle on his sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Quality is dropping
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for years upon years. Lately it seems as if the product is watered down. It used to be a thicker consistency. This hasn't stopped me from buying it yet but it has caught my attention.

reviews.headline: The BEST!
reviews.comments: I have so many acne cleansers it's unbelievable. This is the absolute best face wash I've ever used! Cleans pores, treats blemishes, doesn't dry out skin, balances oil/dryness. Just get it, you won't regret it!

reviews.headline: Cleared my systic acne
reviews.comments: I decided to try my husband's face wash and it removed my make up and acne.I've never been so clear in all my life. My skin is not so dry. It's a life saver. I used the Jack black double duty face lotion just on the dry spots of my face. I love it. I'm going to buy this for him and I now.

reviews.headline: My favorite face wash!
reviews.comments: This product is great for women too! I have used this product for 4 years to wash my face every night, and it is the best for removing makeup at the end of the day - I always feel super clean too! Also, for the past 4 years, I have been generally acne free, and I attribute that to this product. The product removes all oils/makeup/etc. from your face, so afterwards, your face may feel a little dry. However, it isn't a problem if you put on your favorite moisturizer afterwards. The only con about this cleanser is that if it cakes at the top, it will clog the tube, but it is easy to unclog with a toothpick.

reviews.headline: Won't purchase again
reviews.comments: Purchased this exfoliating cleanser for my fiancé to exfoliate his beard, but he doesn't care for it too much. He said he prefers a gentler face cleanser so I won't be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Boyfriend loves it!
reviews.comments: I bought this for my boyfriend because he has thick facial hair (not a long beard however) and he does manual labor so he often comes home with dirt, oil and who knows what else on his face. His beard gets itchy from trapped dry skin and I found this was the perfect solution for him to get rid of the itchiness and to clean the grime from a long day of work off his face. It works wonderfully! And a little goes a long way

reviews.headline: Husbands fav
reviews.comments: My husband loves this line i use it sometimes too ❤️

reviews.headline: I would not purchase again!
reviews.comments:
I was using this face wash daily. I wanted to wait a couple weeks before writing a review. At first I liked this product. A week in and my skin started to burn, itch and now I have red spots. It's extremely drying. My skin is more textured and rough looking than ever. I had high hopes for this product because the reviews were so good. I would advise people with sensitive/acne prone skin to avoid this harsh product. 

I did also try it as a mask and could not keep it on longer than a minute because it was burning my skin so badly.

reviews.headline: GREAT FOR ACNE
reviews.comments: I swear by this product. I tried a sample once & I've been buying it for 3-4 years now & will not use any other face wash ever! It's weird that it's specifically for men but it works wonders on my acne prone skin. I am 22 & on birth control but this stuff is the best face wash I've ever used for my skin.

reviews.headline: Great for acne prone combo skin
reviews.comments: The clay works great for removing impurities. I've tried a lot of overpriced cleansers with glycolic acid and this one is the best. Doesn't dry my face out, it feels very clean and acne free. I'm on my 2nd tube and wanted to make sure I saw consistent results before writing a review.

reviews.headline: No one talks about purging
reviews.comments: So this face wash/mask is amazing BUT it caused a major purge on my skin! That is not necessarily bad but it will make you breakout for about 2 weeks then all the sudden BAM my breakouts have flattened, my texture is improving, and my skin is softer! Gycolic acid will generally cause some sort of purge (you can look it up if you don't believe me lol) but as long as you stick with the wash, don't give up, you'll start seeing some decent results in a couple weeks. I use in conjunction w/ heritage store rose water, cosrx snail mucin, and then cerave daily moisturizer. My acne is typically hormonal & cystic along my jaw but when I purged it was around my cheeks. A purge is not a bad reaction.. a bad reaction is when your skin has small bumps/redness/itching/burning/stinging I DID NOT have this reaction.. my purge was cystic that eventually formed white heads. I tried my best not to pick or pop the white heads. My skin never burned or was irritated while I used this face wash. I hope this helps anyone with acne!

reviews.headline: Worth the money!
reviews.comments: Best results that I've ever had from a men's facial cleanser. Works well as a mask. It's worth the money.

reviews.headline: The Product was amazing, only issue was irritation
reviews.comments: My wife got me into skincare, and i tried a few other brands prior to JB. and when i finally tried JB, it was amazing. the product has incredible scents and does an incredible job. the 1 and ONLY issue is that every time i used the product, i got this huge red rash in my chin area. i used multiple JB products and the result was all the same. hands down one of the best product, and i would recommend to get it, except the fact that there may be something that you could be allergic to

reviews.headline: This is the product for anyone with acne
reviews.comments: I have suffered from acne basically since I was 12. When I tell you I have tried everything, do I mean I have tried everything. I tried the drying approach, salycillic acid, benzyl peroxide, and azelic acid from drugstore and name brand. Anything from Neutrogena, to Clinique, Estee Lauder, Somerville, Murad, Kiehls, Curology, Proactive, and even things you've probably never heard of. Then I tried the natural approach; rose hip oils, tea tree, and assorted natural serums. I did the prescriptions topical creams, the prescription antibiotics and nothing seemed to really work. This face wash leaves my face tight but SO clean. I leave it on as a mask and when I wash it off, my face feels FRESH and I have not had a new breakout or pimple since I started this wash. Though this seems like a men's brand, I am a woman and I can honestly say this is curing my acne, slowly, but surely. If you feel like you have tried everything, forget the price and try this wash and couple it with the clean break moisturizer. I do not regret my decision at all.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: My husband loves this face wash! He uses it every night and it has helped his acne so much. He also uses it once a week as a face mask. Would highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Best Product I've Found!
reviews.comments:
Back in the 2000s Origins had a product called "Get Down Gentle Cleansing Scrub for Oily Skin" it was amazing but they changed it out. And for YEARS I was looking for a replacement. Could be used as a mask or wash, Clay, Ash, no perfume smell, just WORKED. 

Gendered products are stupid, use what works for your skin. This. Works. Because it's a "mans" product it just means it doesn't smell like flowers and shame. GOOD. I want to smell clean. Not like flowers. 

Keeps breakouts down to a minimum, doesn't overdry and make me flake and no stupid useless micro beads that are terrible for your drain. Use good product. 

The cap has had an issue the last 6 bottles I've bought where some product collects after each use and dries out so maybe a different design might be needed.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this face wash! I initially started by using my boyfriends on nights I spent the night and loved it so much I bought my own! I feel like it not only deep cleans my face but keeps my face feeling so soft. I have sensitive skin and it has not made me break out once! It is definitely a must buy!!

reviews.headline: Sensitive skin approved !
reviews.comments: I love this face wash in combination with the clean break oil free moisturizer. I have SUPER sensitive skin, everything I try is either too strong and irritates my skin or is not strong enough. I was on the hunt for a face wash and stumbled across this . I know it's supposed to be for men but this is the perfect face wash for my adult acne . I lather it up as a face wash rubbing it in circular motions for a minute then as it starts to dry up on my face I add a little more to use it as a mask and leave it for 5 minutes. I then apply the clean break moisturizer, with this moisturizer I like that it's light and my skin quickly soaks it up. It does not leave any kind of greasy film. Within the past week of using both products my face has quickly cleared up and my makeup is applying perfectly . I am also realizing that my makeup is lasting longer and not getting greasy as fast as it would . I will say I am getting a few small pimples as this face wash is cleaning the gunk out of my pores but just as they come they are quickly going away . Sn: I realized that my face did not like salicylic acid or benzoyl peroxide so I am happy to say that the glycolic acid in this face wash is not causing any irritation .

faceoff_positive.comments: Best glycolic face wash for the money. I use it every night with my dvf face brush and I have noticed significant reduction of fine lines and the minimal acne that I do get. Love that I can use it as a mask too (typically I use it on my T zone for the mask). It smells fine, a little goes a long way. It lasts almost 3 months at a time for me! I'm a woman btw, and I'm definitely going to check out more men's products lol
faceoff_positive.headline: Bye-bye fine lines and acne ( sensitive skin approved!)

faceoff_negative.comments:
Tried this from a small-volume sample and was really impressed by how it diminished the appearance of my stubborn blackheads and evened the texture of my skin.  I was so enchanted by it, I've since purchased a good amount of bottles and only just recently flipped the bottle to look at the ingredients.  

After a few months of use, I began to see patchy, irritated spots on the skin surrounding the eye area despite my avoiding it.  Based on some further research into the composition of the wash, I believe I exhibited some reaction to the ridiculous amount of fragrance within it.  I understand that it's hard to market a product that doesn't smell pretty but it really makes me not want to repurchase if I continue to experience this reaction due to a set of fragrances that in no way assist the skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Mixed Bag of Effects
